sub_title: AI Strategist & Product Leader | CMO & eCommerce Expert | Generative AI Producer | Business Writer
summary:
I help tech companies, scale-ups, and organizations with entrepreneurial units to start new businesses, launch new digital products, scale strategic programs and build digital execution strategies for achieving sustained and sustainable growth.

As a digital growth and product management leader with over 15 years of experience, I have a proven track record of driving innovation and delivering results for tech and FMCG companies. Here are some examples of recent projects I've worked on:

- Incubated and launched a new generative art technology brand (BlackCube) that offers augmented digital art prints, posters, merchandise, and AI-powered clothing. The brand is gaining traction among tech-savvy consumers passionate about AI advancements

- Pioneered the first Web3, NFT, and Metaverse strategy for a major personal health company, generating €34 million in potential revenue. My efforts educated senior leaders about Web3 technologies, established a sense of urgency, and positioned the Grooming and Beauty Category as the frontrunner for experimentation in Web3 within EMEA

- Led the expansion and growth of subscription products across multiple regions, resulting in double-digit growth in all regions (NAM, WEU, CEE). I fostered a passionate team to develop better business models by leveraging experimentation and A/B testing, achieving peaks of 6.5% in conversion rate on landing pages.

I am skilled at leading cross-functional teams and driving change within organizations, and I have a passion for building lasting relationships and emotional connections with team members and with consumers through purposeful customer experiences.

Some of my specialties:

- Go-to-Market and Go-to-Community strategies, Omnichannel and eRetail experience
- Start-up experience (early-stage startup, late growth, scale-up) and FMCG experience
- Business Online Strategy
- Digital Marketing, Digital Strategy
- Content Management (CRM, CMS)
- Entrepreneur, Intrapreneur within FMCG
- DTC business models, product management, and eCommerce strategy

I am constantly learning and am adept at staying on top of industry trends. As an innovator at heart, I believe in embracing emerging technologies such as AI, blockchain, and Web3. In my free time, I enjoy exploring the latest trends in generative art and digital currencies.

Finally, I also have experience leading workshops about eCommerce, Lean Startup methodologies, agile ways of working, and Direct-to-Consumer business models. I have received positive feedback from workshop attendees and would be happy to share testimonials upon request.

profile_positions.description:
Videowindow is an innovative Dutch technological start-up revolutionizing how we perceive architectural spaces. Videowindow transforms glass façades into media devices and entertainment experiences using procedural generative AI, creating a unique blend of aesthetics and functionality. VideowindoW is a company shaping the future of AI applications in the real world.

As the Chief Marketing Officer and Senior Business Developer, I play a pivotal role in shaping the company's growth and innovation strategies. I lead the team in driving marketing activities and business development, ensuring our efforts are data-driven and customer-focused.

One of my key responsibilities is developing and implementing robust sales funnel strategies, optimizing marketing activities within different target audiences, and fostering strategic partnerships. I leverage my expertise in AI, digital marketing, and product leadership to align our go-to-market strategy with the company's vision and market opportunities.

In addition to marketing and business development, I am actively involved in product development. I work closely with our tech team to ensure our offerings are not only technologically advanced but also cater to the needs of our customers.

Stakeholder management is another crucial part of my role. I participate in Investor Board Meetings, leading discussions on sales and marketing, and work to build strong relationships with our customers, partners, and investors.

This role allows me to utilize my skills in AI strategy development, product leadership, cross-functional team leadership, and data-driven decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer & Senior Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
BlackCube is a pioneering venture into the realm of AI-driven generative art and applications. We are pushing the boundaries of human-AI interaction, creating new forms of expression and experimentation.

As the founder of BlackCube, I've ventured into the unexplored domain of generative art, establishing a distinctive brand that offers AI tools and applications, AI-enhanced digital art prints, posters, merchandise, and a neo-urban clothing line. This unique enterprise caters to a technology-inclined, innovation-embracing customer base with a keen interest in AI progress. This undertaking has amplified my expertise in applied AI, technology integrations, eCommerce, and digital strategy.

In my role, I am responsible for all dimensions of the business and its AI-driven offerings - from conceptualization to realization. This includes managing projects, fostering brand growth, creating content, developing a robust community, and crafting growth strategies. My work with BlackCube has allowed me to leverage my skills in AI strategy development, product leadership, cross-functional team leadership, and data-driven decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Founder, AI Strategist & Prompt Engineer, Generative Art Producer

profile_positions.description:
Sefira Collections is an artistic eco-system: an online boutique and art gallery that offers a unique blend of eco-friendly fashion and nature-inspired decor. Our mission is to promote sustainable living through our products, educating our customers about the environmental impact of their choices, and providing them with stylish, ethical alternatives.

As the Co-Founder and Head of Growth of Sefira Collections, I orchestrate the strategic growth of our brand, which stands at the intersection of fashion, decor, and sustainability. I oversee a broad spectrum of operations, from marketing and financial management to project management and community development, driving our mission to promote sustainable living through our unique offerings.

Leveraging my expertise in digital marketing and eCommerce, I employ data-driven strategies to enhance our brand identity, foster community engagement, and propel Sefira Collections towards becoming a leading name in sustainable fashion and home decor.

In my role, I am dedicated to amplifying our brand's impact, fostering a culture of sustainability, and delivering stylish, ethical alternatives to our eco-conscious customers.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Head of Growth at Sefira Collections

profile_positions.description: I write articles about business and product strategies, digital transformation, change management, leadership, DTC & eCommerce, subscription and membership models, Web3, AI, generative art, and much more.
profile_positions.title: Web Content Writer & Business Author

profile_positions.description:
I served as the CEO of an internal start-up, sponsored by the Head of R&D, part of the Global Innovation Hub. I led an agile team of seven digital experts to pioneer the future of recurring revenue models and build lasting relationships with consumers.

Achievements:

- Transformation. Advocated the first Web3, NFT, and Metaverse strategy for Personal Health. Defined an opportunity of €XX Mio iTO

- Product Development. Led and ignited a passionate team by incubating a disruptive innovation initiative, a complementary and incremental new business model, a community-centered membership. Moved fast from Pre-seed to Seed phase in three months

- Eco-system. Co-designed a proposal for a modular platform based on microservices architecture for the new Venture in twenty-five days
profile_positions.title: Global Director - Venture Builder Web3 Membership Experience (NFT & Metaverse), Grooming and Beauty

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Leadership team, I led an agile team of four (2x digital marketers, 2x project leads) on our subscription products' geographic and portfolio expansion to scale and grow further and fastest.

Achievements:

- Execution. Achieved double-digit growth in a two years timeframe across Western Europe, NAM, and CEE for the OneBlade subscription, including Subscribe and Save, Try & Buy and Club experience models, driven by a collaborative approach with the core business, business partners, functions, and key markets. Moved from Alpha to Beta to BAU phases in 18 months

- Governance. Persuaded the management team to re-organize Ventures’ governance within Grooming and Beauty by developing a strategic plan for how we should innovate, weight opportunities, and organize innovation with new business models

Responsibilities:

- Managing the integral burn rate for the OneBlade NXT venture to improve business performance, from idea generation to go to market and revenues for the ventures, solutions and services in 
portfolio

- Developing clear and achievable strategies, objectives and tactical plans based on consumer & customer needs, market opportunities and in alignment with Market Solutions Combinations (MSCs)

- Closely collaborating with New Business Development in scouting at all various organic / in-organic opportunities to step change the need space

Skills:

- Effective thinking, which includes the objective analysis that is typically associated with critical thinking but also includes broader modes of creativity, originality, engagement and empathy

- Adaptability and Leadershift: dynamic directional changes that have a positive impact on our organization and employees
profile_positions.title: Global Director - Venture Leader DTC Subscriptions, Grooming and Beauty

profile_positions.description:
Through GLEAC, I provide mentorships on storytelling, change management, adopting emerging technologies, digital skills, building empathy, purposeful leadership, and more.

Gleac co-pilots learning, innovation and problem-solving with industry experts. They do it in three ways:

1) On our APP through FLASH MENTORSHIP
2) LIVE TALK SHOWS with three mentors unpacking any topic
3) NFTS which as 5 hours with the world's leading experts
profile_positions.title: Business Mentor

profile_positions.description:
I advise and mentor Web3 start-ups and Web2 companies with entrepreneurial units on:

- Product strategy, Product management, Roadmaps
- Growth Marketing
- Direct-to-consumer (DTC) and new business models
- Innovation funnels (governance and wow frameworks)
- Organic venturing (ideation, incubation, realization)
- Hiring and nurturing T-shaped talents
- Change management and digital transformation in Web2 companies
- Web2 transactional subscriptions
- Web3 community-centered memberships
- Go-to-Market and Go-to-Community strategies
- Business Online Strategy, Digital Strategy
- Program Management and Project Management with SCRUM/AGILE approach

In addition, I provide overall consulting and education on the Web3 world.

Feel free to book a 1:1 session with me on HUMANS: https://humans.work/advisors/andrea-m
profile_positions.title: Advisor/Mentor to HUMANS

profile_positions.description:
In this role:

- I managed and moderated a community of talented augmented creators and AI art producers that have a strong passion for learning how to create digital & generative art through artificial intelligence, making sublime pieces of NFT artworks starting with simple text forms and evolving them through customization.

- I developed a hundred ideas (literally) for product and features development, supporting the team to make the right choices and prioritize efforts according to the needs of the members
profile_positions.title: Social Media Community Manager and Discord Moderator

profile_positions.description:
Mapstr makes it easy to try new places with recommendations from the ones we trust, by allowing users to bookmark & share new places in a mobile app. With 2.5M users & 62M saved places, they're raising to launch a B2B platform allowing businesses to connect with and market to users that have bookmarked their place.

Some stats:
- 2.5M users with no paid acquisition and 20% retention rate after 1 year
- Local Advertising is a $430B market globally and growing
- Used by Vogue, Michelin, Elle, Canal+, Nike, FDJ, Happn and Paris city
- 62M saved places, 100K of the profiles have already between 50 & 50K followers
profile_positions.title: Investor

profile_positions.description:
As the first eCommerce dedicated role integrated into the category, in this position, I drove the eCom digital strategy across Foods Retail brands, nurturing a truly digital culture, supporting the global and local markets and eCom teams in driving initiatives to achieve our growth targets, using emotional intelligence and empathy, really listening and understanding their needs to provide concrete solutions. 

As a champion in Foods category initiatives, my job was to build, influence, persuade and coordinate, with a sales conversion and business-driving approach, increasing our brands' opportunities to accelerate sales through established (Omni-channel) and new eCom channels (Pure play, DTC and more). 

Milestones and achievements:

- Strategy. Created and deployed the first global eCommerce strategy for brands and markets, plus released regular updates on performance to senior stakeholders and management

- eCommerce Portfolio Management. Launched a sustainable portfolio with a size of opportunity €80+ Mio that fits eCommerce needs through eNet Revenue Management analysis
profile_positions.title: Senior Global eCommerce Manager - Head of Foods Division

profile_positions.description:
The co-creation manager role was the business expert representing disruptive and new business models in the innovation process. This key role required influencing skills that can manage up and down across a diverse group of stakeholders. The co-creation leader was a well-rounded e-commerce and innovation expert that brought unique skill sets and thinking to ensure that the propositions of tomorrow represented eCommerce lands.

As Head of Foods, I partnered with brand development and markets to ensure that the pipeline our new e-models is fit in terms of ambition, quantity and quality.

Milestones and achievements:

- M&A. Successfully presented a Foods scanning eBusiness models and companies of interest analysis to the Global President of Foods, in a privileged and confidential 1-to-1 session. The analysis had the objective to recommend a list of start-ups and established companies for acquisition, investment or partnership
- Thorough and detailed pre-assessment analysis and light commercial due diligence of several companies of Interest in EU for the Vice President of Foods Europe and the EU President
- Start-ups. Co-founder of three Foods projects with the potential of becoming double-digit million dollars companies by Y3. Reduced time to market by 2x/3x times compared to regular launches
- Part of a 12 weeks Corporate Accelerator @ Innoleaps Startup Bootcamp in Amsterdam, the #1 ranked Startup Accelerator in Europe. Delivered two validated and profitable DTC eBusiness models (goal was one), approved in terms of funding, money and resources by the President of Europe
- Learning and Capability. Led several Direct-to-Consumer business model workshops around the globe, with the purpose of finding new growth opportunities and new revenue streams. Output example: 2 months of preparation, 30+ marketers involved, 50+ actions identified with owners and timings and double-digit Mio iTO opportunity identified, 4.55+/5.00 rating feedback by attendees
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Direct-to-Consumer eCommerce Co-Creation Manager @ The Hatchouse
